horizonms.metrics

horizonms.metrics.base

horizonms.metrics.sigmoid_metrics

class horizonms.metrics.sigmoid_metrics.SigmoidAccuracy(threshold: float = 0.5, return_average: bool = True)[source]

Bases: object

Accuracy for sigmoid output.

Parameters:

  • threshold (float) – threshold of the sigmoid output. Default is 0.5.

  • return_average (bool) – whether to average among samples.

class horizonms.metrics.sigmoid_softmax_metrics.DiceCoefficient(epsilon: float = 1e-06)[source]

Bases: object

Dice coefficient for network output.

Parameters:

epsilon (float) – a small number for the stability of metric.

class horizonms.metrics.sigmoid_softmax_metrics.IouScore(epsilon: float = 1e-06)[source]

Bases: object

Intersection over union for network output.

Parameters:

epsilon (float) – a small number for the stability of metric.

Bases: object

Accuracy for softmax output.

class horizonms.metrics.softmax_metrics.SoftmaxAccuracyTopk(k: int)[source]

Bases: object

Top-k accuracy for softmax output.

Parameters:

k (int) – parameter in top-k.

class horizonms.metrics.softmax_metrics.SoftmaxCohenKappaScore(weights: str | None = None, category: bool = True, epsilon: float = 1e-10)[source]

Bases: object

Cohen’s kappa for softmax output.

Parameters:

  • weights (str) – the type of Cohen’s kappa.

  • category (bool) – category=True converts both predictions and ground truths as one-hot.

  • epsilon (float) – a small number for the stability of metric.
